member.name: M:Dynamicweb.LessCompiler.LessHelper.GetVariables(System.String)
member.summary: Get all variables from less variable files
member.param: The content of the variable files
member.returns: A list of all the variables from the variable files

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.LessCompiler.LessHelper.CheckForMissingVariables(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Check the less content files for which variables are being used, and compare it to the list of variables given in the arguments
member.param: The list of variables which the variables from the content files will be compared to
A string containing the content from all the less content files
member.returns: A list of all the variable names, which are used in the content files, but not provided in the 'variables' argument

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.LessCompiler.LessHelper.IsValidValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks whether the provided value is valid.
